mean_cn: v.倒（车）；  n.逆向，逆转；  adj.相反的
mean_en: "to change something completely so that it is the opposite of what it was before; when a vehicle or its driver reverses or the driver reverses a vehicle
sentence: He is reversing the car into his driveway.
sentence_trans: 他正将车倒进私家车道里。
word_etyma: re向后，相反 + verse转 → reverse反转，颠倒
